verses.roman:
śuni' mahāprabhu ha-ilā parama ānanda
ke bujhite pāre gaurera kṛpā-chanda-bandha?

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ha-ilā—became; parama ānanda—very pleased; ke bujhite pāre—who can understand; gaurera—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛpā-chanda-bandha—mercy upon His devotee.
translation: Hearing this news, the Lord was very pleased. Who can understand the mercy of the Lord upon His devotee?
